programme.title: Gardeners' World
programme.desc: Idées et conseils d'experts pour entretenir son jardin.

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.desc: Dealers bid to buy a clock, a teddy bear and a mystery copper item.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall
programme.desc: Rick glimpses life in Cornwall 2,000 years ago as he explores the atmospheric ruins of the ancient village of Carn Euny. He soaks up the lively ambiance of Truro cattle market, an important social hub for local farmers but one of only a few live cattle markets still operating in the UK. He cooks his favourite Sunday lunch, a hearty steak and kidney pudding, and goes for a bracing ride on a beautiful hand-built boat, a replica of one of the most famous and fastest vessels to sail the waters around Falmouth a hundred years ago.

programme.title: Weatherman Walking: The Welsh Coast
programme.desc: Weatherman Derek Brockway is on Gower, ignoring the most popular walks to discover some hidden gems. His route takes him from Fall Bay to Oxwich. On the way he tries abseiling, 'weasleing', tolling a church bell, foraging for seaweed and hears stories of smugglers.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: A suivre, les dernières actualités présentées par les équipes rédactionnelles de la BBC, le très réputé radiodiffuseur du service public britannique. Créée en 1922 à Londres, la British Broadcast Corporation est connue pour être la plus ancienne société diffusant des programmes de radio ou de télévision au monde.

programme.title: De l'or en barres
programme.desc: Holland, employé modèle dans le secteur bancaire, fait le projet insensé de s'attaquer à la Banque d'Angleterre. Il compte profiter de la mission qu'on lui a confiée : surveiller un transport de fonds pour s'emparer de lingots d'or. Aidé par Pendleburry, un artisan qui fabrique des tours Eiffel en plomb pour les touristes, il réalise son rêve. Le plomb des tours Eiffel est remplacé par l'or volé, mais des vacanciers achètent, sans le savoir, les précieux souvenirs. C'est alors que la chasse aux tours Eiffel commence mais tourne mal : Pendleburry est arrêté et Holland prend la fuite pour Rio de Janeiro... Année de réalisation : 1951

programme.title: Passeport pour Pimlico
programme.desc: Eté 1950 à Londres. En plus d'une vague de chaleur, le rationnement en cette période d'après-guerre éprouve la population. A la suite de l'explosion d'un obus durant le déminage du quartier de Pimlico, on découvre des lingots d'or et une lettre datant du XVe siècle dans l'entonnoir de la bombe. C'est ainsi que les habitants du quartier apprennent que Pimlico est rattaché à la Bourgogne. Aussitôt, tous revendiquent leur indépendance et de ce fait s'approprient le trésor... Année de réalisation : 1949

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Pas de description

programme.title: Eggheads
programme.desc: Jeremy Vine hosts a general knowledge quiz featuring the greatest quiz team in Britain.

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers' Pubs That Built Britain
programme.desc: Si and Dave step back in time to the 50s and 60s of London's East End. Today, they uncover murder and brutality when their tour takes them to pubs once central to the criminal deeds of the notorious Kray twins. Si takes a drive with an old associate of the Krays, while Dave learns to fight the Kray way at the Repton Boxing Club, where the deadly duo once trained.

programme.title: Beechgrove Repotted
programme.desc: In this episode, the Beechgrove team marry sustainability with staying on-trend. Carole, Kirsty and Mairi are introduced to the plant craft of Kokedama by local house plant expert Fiona Macdonald. At her Edinburgh allotment, Kirsty demonstrates that you can still be on-trend and sustainable even if you are short of space, as she shows how to create a living-herb wall made from recycled materials.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers
programme.desc: Saison 1 Episode 1 Le fleuve Amazone est un monde secret, qui abrite l'anguille électrique géante, la loutre géante, des sources d'eaux chaudes et un récif méconnu, à l'embouchure du fleuve. Année de réalisation : 2018

programme.title: My Unique B&B
programme.desc: Saison 2 Episode 11 Simon visits Shropshire to help turn 1940s railway carriage into a unique B&B. Année de réalisation : 2022

programme.title: Charlie Mackesy: The Boy, the Mole, the Fox, the Horse, and Me
programme.desc: Charlie Mackesy's The Boy, the Mole, the Fox and the Horse has touched millions of readers around the world and is now an animated film. This is the story of the man behind the book. At the age of 56, he published his extraordinary tale, which in less than two years sold over eight million copies worldwide, sitting on the Sunday Times Bestseller List longer than any other book ever. This intimate, revealing portrait lets us into Charlie's world, exploring how he came to write the book and following him as he embarks on turning The Boy, the Mole, the Fox and the Horse into an animated film. With insights from friends including filmmaker Richard Curtis and explorer Bear Grylls, an unexpected story unfolds of how grief and vulnerability can be turned into a message of strength and compassion that has helped thousands of readers.

programme.title: Flog It !
programme.desc: In this edition, Flog It! flies around the UK, touching down at historic hotspots like Capesthorne Hall in Cheshire, where Anita Manning has a surprise in store for one lucky lady. Paul Martin visits Chedworth Roman Villa in the Cotswolds.

programme.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
programme.desc: Kaye Adams, Mark Chapman, Philip Glenister and Thanyia Moore test their general knowledge.

programme.title: B&B By the Sea
programme.desc: Deborah Meaden has taken time out of her busy schedule to lend a hand to the B&B team. She has a unique connection to the sea, making this visit even more personal for the TV star. This stay is also an experience of firsts for Deborah, who has never been to Northern Ireland before, never ridden a horse in the sea before and - wait for this - never cooked a meal before. Sharon and the team hope to see if this "dragon" can take the heat in the kitchen.

programme.title: Between the Covers
programme.desc: Sara is joined by presenter Nick Knowles, comedian Sara Barron, presenter and actor Ore Oduba, and Saturday Kitchen wine expert and author Helen McGinn. They share their favourite books and review the two book club choices: the new book pick, Hungry Ghosts by Kevin Jared Hosein, and the fifth of a selection of books set in Europe to celebrate Eurovision, I'm Not Scared by Niccolò Ammaniti, which is set in Italy.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: The crews race to save a man suffering a stroke and a kayaker in trouble in the North Sea

programme.title: Mastermind
programme.desc: Clive Myrie presents the fifth semi-final of the classic quiz where contenders return to the black chair under the glare of the spotlight and the ticking clock to win a place in the grand final. The specialist subjects are Fridtjof Nansen, the record label 4AD, Christina Rossetti and the Jason Bourne films.

programme.title: University Challenge
programme.desc: The quarter-finals continue. Two more teams return for another qualification match; both have won one quarter-final already, and a second win will guarantee a place in the semis. Jeremy Paxman asks the questions.

programme.title: Secrets of the Chippendales Murders
programme.desc: Saison 1 Episode 3 The NYPD investigate multiple leads into the murder of Nick De Noia. Possible motives include a love triangle, insurance fraud, and an angry boss--all of which lead nowhere. Years later, the FBI receive a tip from a hitman named 'Strawberry', who blows the case wide open. Année de réalisation : 2021

programme.title: Le lauréat
programme.desc: Ses études achevées, le jeune Benjamin Braddock rentre chez lui, couvert de diplômes. Ses parents donnent une grande réception au cours de laquelle Ben rencontre madame Robinson, une femme mûre. A la fin de la soirée, celle-ci lui demande de la raccompagner. Elle tente de le séduire mais l'arrivée de son mari interrompt le tête-à-tête. Quelques jours plus tard, Ben, toujours vierge, découvre les plaisirs de l'amour avec madame Robinson, dans une chambre d'hôtel. Les parents de Ben, qui ignorent tout de cette relation, incitent leur fils à sortir avec Elaine, la fille des Robinson. Benjamin, réticent au début, va rapidement s'attacher à l'étudiante. Madame Robinson lui interdit alors de revoir Elaine, derechef envoyée dans une lointaine université... Année de réalisation : 1967

programme.title: Gods of Snooker
programme.desc: Though snooker was firmly established on our TV screens by the early 80s, the game's money-spinning potential had not yet been realised. One of the first to spot a business opportunity was savvy Essex-based sports promoter Barry Hearn, who had recently taken a young hopeful called Steve Davis under his wing. Davis was the polar opposite of people's champion Alex Higgins: slow, precise and intent.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Margherita Taylor and Joe Crowley prove there is more to Sherwood Forest than Robin Hood.

programme.title: Dragons' Den
programme.desc: Des entrepreneurs en herbe tentent de convaincre des investisseurs de soutenir financièrement leur projet.

programme.title: Make It at Market
programme.desc: Dom and his team help woodturner Shannon and upcycler Ryan produce more marketable pieces.

programme.title: This is BBC Two
programme.desc: This is BBC Two.
